posts.title: Js时间戳
posts.text: Javascript 时间戳转换 123456789101112131415161718192021 function toDate(time) { var date = new Date(time); var y = date.getFullYear(); var M = date.getMonth() + 1; var d = date.getDate(); var h = date.getHours(); var m = date.getMinutes(); var s = date.getSeconds(); return y + '年' + M + '月' + d;}function toHour(time) { var date = new Date(time); var y = date.getFullYear(); var M = date.getMonth() + 1; var d = date.getDate(); var h = date.getHours(); var m = date.getMinutes(); var s = date.getSeconds(); return d + '天' + h + '小时';} var unixTimestamp = toDate(v.start * 1000); 其中==start #108be0==表示毫秒的时间戳==unixTimestamp #0d7bbb==表示变量名
